original_text:
The Lord has given full vent to his wrath;
    he has poured out his fierce anger.
He kindled a fire in Zion
    that consumed her foundations.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 분을 내시며 그의 맹렬한 진노를 쏟으심이여 시온에 불을 지르사 그 터를 사르셨도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord has given full vent to his wrath
he has poured out his fierce anger
He kindled a fire in Zion
